name: Roboboss
description:
short "bullet hell" made for odd week long game jam 3

made in free version of construct 2

CONTROLS:

hold right mouse button to move

left click to shoot

i rushed a bit this game but i'm very satisfied with the result :)

music: Double the bits - TeknoAxe      http://teknoaxe.com/Link_Code_3.php?q=1178
